name.fr: Boîte de Parchemins de Fusion B
name.jp: 製錬スクロールパッケージB

description.en: A package containing 10x Scroll of SProtect, 8x Scroll of GProtect, 16x Scroll of AProtect and 8x Scroll of Weapon Bonus. All items are also linked.
description.ar: A package containing 10x Scroll of SProtect, 8x Scroll of GProtect, 16x Scroll of AProtect and 8x Scroll of Weapon Bonus. All items are also linked.
description.br: Ao abrir este pacote você receberá os seguintes itens: (10x) Pergaminho de Proteção S, (8x) Pergaminho de Proteção G, (16x) Pergaminho de Proteção A e (8x) Pergaminho do Bônus de Arma. Todos os itens são ligados à alma.

description.de: Ein Paket, das 10x Scroll of SProtect, 8x Scroll of GProtect, 16x Scroll of AProtect und 8x Scroll of Weapon Bonus enthält. Alle Items sind seelengebunden.

description.fr: Paquet qui contient 10 Parchemins Sprotect, 8 Parchemins Gprotect, 16 Parchemins Aprotect et 8 Parchemins de Bonus d'Arme. Tous les objets sont liés.
description.id: Paket berisi 10x Scroll of SProtect, 8x Scroll of GProtect, 16x Scroll of AProtect dan 8x Scroll of Weapon Bonus. Semua item juga terhubung.
description.it: A package containing 10x Scroll of SProtect, 8x Scroll of GProtect, 16x Scroll of AProtect and 8x Scroll of Weapon Bonus. All items are also linked.
description.jp: 鍛冶屋の心得・精錬編x10、鍛冶屋の心得・ソケット作成編x8、鍛冶屋の心得・アクセサリー編x16と武器ボーナスの巻物x8が含まれたパッケージ。すべてのアイテムはリンクされています。

description.th: แพคเกจนี้ประกอบด้วย Scroll of SProtect 10 ชิ้น,Scroll of GProtect 8 ชิ้น, Scroll of AProtect 16 ชิ้น และ Scroll of Weapon Bonus 8 ขิ้น ไอเท็มทั้งหมดผูกมัด
description.tw: 包含 10x 精鍊防爆卷軸、8x 穿洞防爆卷軸、16x 飾品防爆卷軸和 8x 武器增幅卷軸卷軸的禮包，所有道具都是被鏈接歸屬。
description.vi: Một gói chứa 10x Scroll of SProtect, 8x Scroll of GProtect, 16x Scroll of AProtect và 8x Scroll of Weapon Bonus. Tất cả các vật phẩm được liên kết.
